item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, January 18, 2025 at 10:10 PM UTC
item.description:

2. VS Code Pets (81 points | 14 comments)
3. Why do bees die when they sting you? (151 points | 112 comments)

22. Designing a Star Tracker for Astronaut Don Pettit to Use on the ISS (42 points | 15 comments)
23. Perplexity AI submits bid to merge with TikTok (6 points | 1 comment)
24. TCL's bet on screens that look like paper (75 points | 74 comments)
25. Playful Drawings That Charles Darwin's Children Left on His Manuscripts (100 points | 39 comments)

27. Show HN: ZX Spectrum SCR to PNG Converter (12 points | 5 comments)
28. Has LLM killed traditional NLP? (96 points | 105 comments)
29. The Toyota Prius transformed the auto industry (128 points | 190 comments)
30. O1 isn't a chat model (and that's the point) (108 points | 76 comments)
